Name: Academy Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Academic.

Name: Arcanist Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Arcanist.

Name: Ascension
Description: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 75% more damage.

Name: Assassin Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Assassin.

Name: Binary Airdrop
Description: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat.

Name: Bodyguard Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bodyguard.

Name: Bruiser Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bruiser.

Name: Built Different 1
Description: Your units with no Traits active gain 300 Health and 50% Attack Speed.

Name: Calculated Loss
Description: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

Name: Celestial Blessing 1
Description: Your units heal for 10% of the damage dealt by attacks and abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

Name: Challenger Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Challenger.

Name: Chemical Overload 1
Description: Chemtechs explode on death, dealing 30% of their maximum Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

Name: Chemtech Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Chemtech.

Name: Clockwork Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Clockwork.

Name: Cutthroat
Description: Assassins Mana Reave the first unit they attack, increasing their maximum Mana by 65% until they cast.

Name: Cybernetic Implants 1
Description: Your units equipped with an item gain 200 Health and 20 Attack Damage.

Name: Dominance
Description: After winning your combat, gain 1 bonus gold for every 2 surviving units.

Name: Dual Rule
Description: There are now 2 Tyrants.

Name: Duet
Description: Summon 1 additional Socialite Spotlight.

Name: En Garde
Description: The first time an enemy is attacked by a Challenger, they are Disarmed for 3 seconds.

Name: Enchanter Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Enchanter.

Name: Enforcer Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Enforcer.

Name: Exiles 1
Description: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 40% maximum Health shield for 8 seconds.

Name: Featherweights 1
Description: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 45% movement and Attack Speed.

Name: First Aid Kit
Description: All healing and shielding received by your units is increased by 35%.

Name: Hyper Roll
Description: If you have less than 10 gold at the end of a round, gain 3 gold.

Name: Imperial Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Imperial.

Name: Innovator Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Innovator.

Name: Item Grab Bag 1
Description: Gain 1 random completed item and 1 Reforger.

Name: Knife's Edge 1
Description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Attack Damage.

Name: Makeshift Armor 1
Description: Your units with no items gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

Name: Mercenary Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mercenary.

Name: Mutant Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mutant.

Name: One For All
Description: When your Syndicates die, they grant your other Syndicates 20 Attack Damage and Ability Power.

Name: Pandora's Items
Description: Gain a random component. At the start of each turn, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Name: Phony Frontline
Description: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

Name: Pirates
Description: Mercenary units have a 50% chance to drop 1 gold when they kill an enemy.

Name: Protector Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Protector.

Name: Runic Shield 1
Description: Arcanists start combat with a shield equal to 250% of their Ability Power.

Name: Scholar Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scholar.

Name: Scoped Weapons
Description: Double the hex range of your ranged units, and their attacks cannot miss.

Name: Scrap Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scrap.

Name: Self-Repair
Description: When the Innovation dies, it will become untargetable and repair itself if an Innovator is still alive.

Name: Sniper Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sniper.

Name: Sniper's Nest
Description: Snipers gain +10% damage for each round fought from the same starting hex. (Maximum +40%)

Name: So Small
Description: Yordles gain 35% Dodge Chance.

Name: Socialite Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Socialite.

Name: Stand Behind Me
Description: At the start of combat, Bodyguards grant 75% of their Armor bonus to non-Bodyguard allies directly behind them (does not stack).

Name: Stand United 1
Description: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your team.

Name: Syndicate Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Syndicate.

Name: Thrill of the Hunt 1
Description: Your units heal 300 Health on kill.

Name: Tinker
Description: Every 1 combat round(s) with Scrap active, gain a Magnetic Remover or Reforger.

Name: Twinshot Heart
Description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Twinshot.

Name: Underdogs
Description: Whenever your team has fewer units alive than your opponent, your units regenerate 10% of their missing Health each second.

Name: Unstable Evolution
Description: Mutants randomly gain one of the following when they reach 2 star: 600 Health, 40% Attack Speed, 40 Attack Damage, or 40 Ability Power. These bonuses stack.

Name: Weakspot
Description: Your units' attacks ignore 20% of the target's Armor and reduce healing received by 50% for 5 seconds.

Name: A New Challenger
Description: Gain a Challenger Emblem.

Name: Academy Honors
Description: Gain an Academy Emblem.

Name: All For One
Description: When an ally dies, they grant the Tyrant 40% of their maximum Health.

Name: Ancient Archives
Description: Gain 1 Tome of Traits.

Name: Arcane Sigil
Description: Gain an Arcanist Emblem.

Name: Ardent Censer
Description: Allies healed or shielded by Enchanters gain 40% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat (maximum once every 2 seconds).

Name: Armor Plating
Description: Colossus become invulnerable for 2 seconds the first time their Health drops to 60% and 30%.

Name: Beef Up
Description: Gain a Bruiser Emblem.

Name: Built Different 2
Description: Your units with no Traits active gain 450 Health and 65% Attack Speed.

Name: Bulwark
Description: Gain a Protector Emblem.

Name: Celestial Blessing 2
Description: Your units heal for 15% of the damage dealt by attacks and abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 450 Health.

Name: Chemical Overload 2
Description: Chemtechs explode on death, dealing 45% of their maximum Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

Name: Clear Mind
Description: If you have no units on your bench at the end of a round, gain 3 experience points.

Name: Cram Session
Description: After casting their first Ability, Academics restore 80% of their maximum Mana.

Name: Cybernetic Implants 2
Description: Your units equipped with an item gain 300 Health and 30 Attack Damage.

Name: Deadeye
Description: Gain a Sniper Emblem.

Name: Element X
Description: Gain a Chemtech Emblem.

Name: Exiles 2
Description: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 60% maximum Health shield for 8 seconds.

Name: Experiment 13-37
Description: Gain a Mutant Emblem.

Name: Featherweights 2
Description: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 65% movement and Attack Speed.

Name: Gold Reserves
Description: Mercenaries deal 1% more damage per 1 gold you have. (Maximum +60%)

Name: Hidden Blade
Description: Gain an Assassin Emblem.

Name: High Roller
Description: Gain 2 Loaded Dice.

Name: Hired Gun
Description: Gain a Mercenary Emblem.

Name: Imperial Banner
Description: Gain an Imperial Emblem.

Name: Instant Injection
Description: Chemtechs now additionally trigger their bonuses at the start of combat.

Name: Junkyard
Description: Gain a random component every 3 combat rounds with the Scrap Trait active.

Name: Knife's Edge 2
Description: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 50 Attack Damage.

Name: Lifelong Learning
Description: Scholars that survive combat permanently gain 5 Ability Power.

Name: Makeshift Armor 2
Description: Your units with no items gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

Name: March of Progress
Description: Gain 4 bonus experience points per round. You can no longer use gold to gain experience points.

Name: Metabolic Accelerator
Description: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health at the start of each round.

Name: Metal Detector
Description: Gain a Scrap Emblem.

Name: Payday
Description: After winning your combat, gain 1 bonus gold for each surviving Syndicate.

Name: Rich Get Richer
Description: Gain 10 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

Name: Runic Shield 2
Description: Arcanists start combat with a shield equal to 375% of their Ability Power.

Name: Safety Vest
Description: Gain a Bodyguard Emblem.

Name: Salvage Bin
Description: Gain a random completed item. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

Name: Shady Business
Description: Gain a Syndicate Emblem.

Name: Sharpshooter
Description: Twinshot's ranged attacks and abilities can bounce once, dealing 40% less damage.

Name: Shrug It Off
Description: Bruisers regenerate 2.5% of their maximum Health each second.

Name: Smoke Bomb
Description: The first time Assassins drop below 60% Health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding all negative effects.

Name: Spell Blade
Description: Arcanists' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 50% Ability Power on hit.

Name: Stand United 2
Description: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your team.

Name: Sunfire Board
Description: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 20% of their maximum HP over 8 seconds and reduce healing received by 50%.

Name: Thrill of the Hunt 2
Description: Your units heal 500 Health on kill.

Name: Tick Tock
Description: Gain a Clockwork Emblem.

Name: Titanic Force
Description: Your units with more than 1200 maximum Health gain Attack Damage equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

Name: Trade Sector
Description: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

Name: Valedictorian
Description: Gain a Scholar Emblem.

Name: Wise Spending
Description: Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

Name: Woodland Charm
Description: At the start of combat, your highest Health Champion creates a 1200 Health copy of themself (excluding items).

Description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Academics.

Description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

Description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Bodyguards.

Name: Broken Stopwatch
Description: 5 seconds into combat, all enemies and non-Clockwork units are frozen in time for 5 seconds.

Name: Bruiser Soul
Description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Bruisers.

Description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Innovators.

Description: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Reforgers.

Description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Mercenaries.

Description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Scholars.
